original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo chattupāhanaṁ dhārenti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhuniyaḥ chattupāhanam dhārenti

original: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo chattupāhanaṁ dhāressanti, seyyathāpi gihiniyo kāmabhoginiyo”ti.
analyzed: katham hi nāma bhikkhuniyaḥ chattupāhanam dhāressanti seyyathā api gihiniyaḥ kāmabhoginiyaḥ ti

original: Assosuṁ kho bhikkhuniyo tesaṁ manussānaṁ ujjhāyantānaṁ khiyyantānaṁ vipācentānaṁ.
analyzed: assosum kho bhikkhuniyaḥ tesam manussānam ujjhāyantānam khiyyantānam vipācentāna

original: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
analyzed: yāḥ tāḥ bhikkhuniyaḥ appicchāḥ pe tāḥ ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti
katham hi nāma chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhuniyaḥ chattupāhanam dhāressanti iti pe

original: “saccaṁ kira, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo chattupāhanaṁ dhārentī”ti?
analyzed: saccam kira bhikkhave chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhuniyaḥ chattupāhanam dhārenti iti

original: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo chattupāhanaṁ dhāressanti.
analyzed: katham hi nāma bhikkhave chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhuniyaḥ chattupāhanam dhāressanti
na ita bhikkhave appasannānam vā pasādāya pe

original: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddisantu—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave bhikkhuniyaḥ imam sikkhāpadam uddisantu
yā pana bhikkhunī chattu pāhanam dhāreyya pācittiyanti

original: Evañcidaṁ bhagavatā bhikkhunīnaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ paññattaṁ hoti.
analyzed: evañca idam bhagavatā bhikkhunīnam sikkhāpadam paññattam hoti

original: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarā bhikkhunī gilānā hoti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena aññatarā bhikkhunī gilānā hoti

original: Tassā vinā chattupāhanaṁ na phāsu hoti …pe…
analyzed: vinā chattupāhanam na phāsu hoti pe

original: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddisantu—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave bhikkhuniyaḥ imam sikkhāpadam uddisantu

original: “Yā pana bhikkhunī agilānā chattupāhanaṁ dhāreyya, pācittiyan”ti.
analyzed: yā pana bhikkhunī a gilānā chattu pāhanam dhāreyya pācittiyanti
pe ayam imasmin atthe adhippetā bhikkhunī iti

original: yassā vinā chattupāhanaṁ na phāsu hoti.
analyzed: vinā chattu pāhanam na phāsu hoti

original: tīṇi chattāni— setacchattaṁ, kilañjacchattaṁ, paṇṇacchattaṁ maṇḍalabaddhaṁ salākabaddhaṁ.
analyzed: tīṇi chattāni setacchatta kilañjacchatta paṇṇacchattam maṇḍalabaddham salākabaddha

original: Agilānā agilānasaññā chattupāhanaṁ dhāreti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: a gilānā a gilāna saññā chattupāhanam dhāreti āpatti pācittiyassa

original: Agilānā vematikā chattupāhanaṁ dhāreti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: a gilānā vematikā chattu pāhanam dhāreti āpatti pācittiyassa

original: Agilānā gilānasaññā chattupāhanaṁ dhāreti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: agilānā gilāna saññā chattupāhanam dhāreti āpatti pācittiyassa

original: Chattaṁ dhāreti na upāhanaṁ, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: chattam dhāreti na upāhane āpatti dukkaṭassa

original: Upāhanaṁ dhāreti na chattaṁ, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: upāhanam dhāreti na chatte āpatti dukkaṭassa
gilānā a gilāna saññā āpatti dukkaṭassa
